mapper.select: SELECT pi.product_id,pi.images,pi.good_to_know,pi.care_inst, pi.measure_part,pi.docs_file,pi.key_features,pi.designer, pi.design_thoughts,pi.package_info, p.product_id "product.product_id", p.keywords "product.keywords", p.product_title "product.product_title", p.product_image "product.product_image", p.product_initial_num "product.product_initial_num", p.product_price "product.product_price", p.display_measurements "product.display_measurements" FROM product_info pi INNER JOIN product p ON pi.product_id=p.product_id WHERE pi.product_id=#{productId}

SELECT pi.product_id,pi.images,pi.good_to_know,pi.care_inst, pi.measure_part,pi.docs_file,pi.key_features,pi.designer, pi.design_thoughts,pi.package_info, p.product_id "product.product_id", p.keywords "product.keywords", p.product_title "product.product_title", p.product_image "product.product_image", p.product_initial_num "product.product_initial_num", p.product_price "product.product_price", p.display_measurements "product.display_measurements" FROM product_info pi INNER JOIN product p ON pi.product_id=p.product_id WHERE pi.designer=#{designer} limit #{offset},#{limit}
